outputs.output_descr: (1) Improved institutional capacities to receive and redress public grievances; (2) Improved public interface with the WMS and other ATI related federal agencies; improved coordination on ATI in service delivery; and (4) Effective knowledge management and improved access to information in ATI and service delivery.
